seo.title: Ethiopian Calendar - Passport Release Schedule
seo.description: View the Ethiopian calendar to track passport release dates and important deadlines. Plan your passport application with our traditional calendar view.

header.title: Ethiopian Calendar
header.description: Check out the date, holidays and wengalat

selectedDate.label: Selected date
selectedDate.noHighlights: We don't have any recorded highlights for this date yet.

geezNumbers.title: Geeʼz Numbering System
geezNumbers.description1: Amharic has its own traditional number system that is still used in some cultural and liturgical contexts. It's different from the "Arabic numerals" (0–9) that are common worldwide.
geezNumbers.description2: Here are the basic Amharic numerals (፩–፼):
geezNumbers.tapHint: tap the Amharic name to hear pronunciation ↘︎

readingTips.title: Reading tips
readingTips.tip1: Combine Geeʼz numerals from largest value to smallest. ፳፻፲፫ = 2013 EC: ፳ (20) × ፻ (100) gives 2000, then ፲፫ adds 13.
readingTips.tip2: Pagume includes only five days—six on leap years—so it is perfect for highlighting seasonal content before the Ethiopian New Year.
